metadata.name: Morning coffee with the Love cloud.
metadata.description:
No matter where I go, love is always following me. 

Sometimes she just casually drinks coffee in the cafe in the form of a cloud, I was luck to capture this blissful moment.

It happened in my favorite cafe Santa Crema in Sorocaba, the city where I lived in Brazil.
 
I visited it pretty often, it was good space to focus and work accompanied by a delicious flat white and cozy atmosphere.

At Cafe Crema we had meetings my friend Katya, who was probably the only Russian-speaking person in that area of Brazil and luckily we found each other, later we even made business together.

And then I left Brazil, but Cafe Crema and its vibe stayed with me as warm of memory.
